Customize your new tab page and help people all over the world.

How does it work ?
- with GoodTabs your browser will transform your "new tab" page to a hole new experince with a custom background, a nice clock, a searchbar and your most vistied sites. Sometimes there will be ads at the bottom right corner but all the money collected with these ads will be donated !
